title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Agricultural and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Agricultural and 

Horticultural Industry) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (agricultural horticultural industry) order 2023

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

the husbandry and reproductive management of animals on a farm 
for the production of products including, but not limited to: food 
and feed; food and feed ingredients; live animals for sale; and 
textiles, fuels, cosmetics and/or medicines; 

the husbandry and reproductive management of horses for 
purposes including, but not limited to: use in equestrian sports and 
recreation; use in agricultural work; use in transportation; and use 
by law enforcement personnel in the conduct of law enforcement 
activities; 

cultivation, planting, 

inspection, maintenance 

the 
and 
reproductive management of plants, fungi or algae on a farm for 
the production of products including, but not limited to: food and 
feed; food and feed ingredients; live plants, fungi and/or algae for 
sale; and textiles, fuels, cosmetics and medicines; and 

the cultivation, planting, inspection, maintenance, styling and 
reproductive management of plants for purposes including, but 
not limited to: conservation; recreation and/or enjoyment; and 
sale as live plants.

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: In this Order:
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order: 

"2002 Regulation" means Regulation (EC) No 178/2002 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 28 January 2002 laying down the general 
principles and requirements of food law, establishing the European Food Safety 
Authority and laying down procedures in matters of food safety; 

"animal" means a member of the kingdom animalae other than a human being; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 23rd June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [317] 3 

"feed" has the meaning assigned to it in Article 3(4) of the 2002 Regulation; 

"food" has the meaning assigned to it in Article 2 of the 2002 Regulation.

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: 4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry
text_raw:
4. The provisions of this Order shall not apply to any activity of industry 

for which a separate industrial training order is, for the time being, in force. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

8 June 2023. 

The Seal of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna was affixed in the presence of: 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [317]

title: employed in such activities, in exercise of the powers conferred on it by section
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the agricultural and horticultural industry in 
relation to which An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall 
exercise its functions in the creation of statutory apprenticeships. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [317] 5
